alert.note: Alert for Benson; Ramsey; Towner (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 8:52PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Benson, southwestern Towner and west central Ramsey Counties through 930 PM CDT... At 852 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Berwick to near Fillmore to Maddock. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cando, Leeds, Bisbee, Brinsmade, Harlow, Knox and York. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for northeastern North Dakota.
